headline: AEP secures $1.6bn federal loan guarantee for power line upgrades in Midwest
summary: The project involves replacing existing transmission lines with new ones that have stronger energy capacity.

headline: A Once-in-a-Decade Investment Opportunity: 1 Vanguard Index Fund to Buy for the AI Boom
summary: U.S. electricity demand could reach levels not seen in decades as artificial intelligence drives data center power consumption.
